schemas.description: Sloan Digital Sky Survey Data Relase 13

tables.description: Emission line measurements from MPA-JHU spectroscopic reanalysis

columns.description: Unique database ID based on PLATE, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D

Continuum at line center from 200 pixel median smoothing of the emission-line subtracted continuum
Error in the continuum computed from the variance in the band pass

The equivalent width of the continuum-subtracted emission line computed from straight integration over the bandpasses listed below (emisison is negative). In this case the continuum comes from a running 200 pixel median and does not properly account for stellar absorption. In general the EQW measurements provide a better measure of the true equivalent width. The purpose of this measurement is to help characterize the stellar absorption effecting the line. (EW_stellar = REQW - EQW)
Error in the equivalent width described above

The equivalent width of the CB08 continuum-subtracted emission line computed from straight integration over the bandpasses listed below (emisison is negative) . This properly takes into account stellar absorption. Note that it will not be correct in the case of blended lines (ie NII & H-alpha) -- instead use FLUX/CONT.
Error in the equivalent width described above
Flux from Gaussian fit to continuum subtracted data. (Note that the fit is done simultaneously to all the lines so de-blending happens automatically)
Error in the flux
Instrumental resolution at the line center (measured for each spectrum from the ARC lamps)
Reduced chi-squared of the line fit over the bandpass used for the EW measurement
Continuum at line center from 200 pixel median smoothing of the emission-line subtracted continuum
Error in the continuum computed from the variance in the band pass

The width of the [O II] line in a free fit (ie. not tied to other emission lines)
The flux of the [O II] doublet from a free fit.
The estimated uncertainty on OII_FLUX
The velocity offset of the [O II] doublet from a free fit
chi^2 of the fit to the [O II] line in free fit
The width of the [O III]5007 line in a free fit (ie. not tied to other emission lines)
The flux of the [O III]5007 line from a free fit.
The estimated uncertainty on OIII_FLUX
The velocity offset of the [O III]5007 line from a free fit
chi^2 of the fit to the [O III]5007 line in free fit

The multiplicative scale factor applied to the original flux and error spectra prior to measurement of the emission lines to improve the spectrophotometric accuracy. The rescaling insures that a synthetic r-band magnitude computed from the spectrum matches the r-band fiber magnitude measured by the photometric pipeline.
